text: Thank you DeckMasters Team for my beautiful deck.  I was pleasantly surprised to learn that they can build in the wintertime in Alaska!  Their quote was everything they promised.  Jackie did a wonderful job of communicating with me regarding timelines and what could be expected.  They are extremely professional and answered all my questions and concerns with certainty.  I can't wait for the sun to come out and enjoy my deck for years to come!!
author: Jennifer L.
